name: morcellate
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
to break body tissue, bone, etc. into very small pieces so it can be removed from the body: In this form of hysterectomy, the uterus can be morcellated rather than incised. In the past, some surgeons would morcellate the kidney inside the body before removing it.
More examplesFewer examplesA rotating blade morcellates adjacent tissue.The fibroid is morcellated with an electrical morcellator.Morcellated bone graft has been applied on each side of the plate.
